Tool Library

NameTools
AuthorSAGA User Group Associaton (c) 2002-2013
Version1.0
File/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/saga/libtable_tools.so

Description

Tools for the creation and manipulation of tables.

Tools

IDName
0Create New Table
1Transpose Table
2Enumerate Table Field
3Join Attributes from a Table
4Join Attributes from a Table (Shapes)
5Change Date Format
6Change Time Format
7Change Field Type
8Append Fields from another Table
9Change Color Format
10Replace Text
11Delete Fields
15Copy Selection
16Delete Selection
17Invert Selection
18Select by Numerical Expression
19Select by String Expression
20Add Indicator Fields for Categories
